metadata.synopsis: At camp, Shadowheart experiences a brief flare-up of mysterious magical energy, She reacts with alarm an utters the name of Shar, her patron goddess. If other party members are present, they ask her what just happened.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Bypass the scene trigger for FOR_Village_OM_ShadowHeart_COM, then go to camp after having reached the goblin camp. CFM will be added to the camp night queue (may not trigger immediately)

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.text: Something's wrong. I feel... I feel...
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: Ngh, it hurts... Darkness protect me...
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.

68.speaker: Player
68.context: NodeContext: A little shaken, but trying to brush it off.

81.speaker: Shadowheart
81.context: NodeContext: A little shaken, but trying to brush it off.

37.speaker: Player
37.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval upNodeContext: Tiny bit of gratitude while still trying to dismiss the topic.

84.speaker: Shadowheart
84.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval upNodeContext: Tiny bit of gratitude while still trying to dismiss the topic.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Don't worry. Whatever it is, we're in this together.
29.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval upNodeContext: Tiny bit of gratitude while still trying to dismiss the topic.

67.speaker: Shadowheart
67.text: I... thank you. But I'm sure it was nothing. I just... need a little space.
67.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval upNodeContext: Tiny bit of gratitude while still trying to dismiss the topic.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Pull yourself together. We've all got fears to wrestle with.
73.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: A little wounded by the player's brusque 'pull yourself together' advice

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: I know that. I had just hoped you might show some more understanding. Leave me alone, please.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: A little wounded by the player's brusque 'pull yourself together' advice

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: I don't need your tough love. I need to be left alone. Now.
21.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval downNodeContext: Cold anger.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Not some sort of Sharran magic...?
64.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: Troubled speculation. She doesn't understand the strange magic afflicting her.

12.speaker: Shadowheart
12.text: No... or at least, I don't think so. Perhaps Lady Shar is testing me somehow. But if she is, then I have no idea what her purpose is.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: Troubled speculation. She doesn't understand the strange magic afflicting her.

78.speaker: Shadowheart
78.text: I said I don't know. Forget it.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Could it be her tadpole? Ask how she feels.

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: I'm fine. It's passed, whatever it was...

28.speaker: Shadowheart
28.text: ...and stop looking at me like that. I'm not sprouting tentacles just yet.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Use your shared connection. Enter her thoughts.

42.text: *Uncertainty. Shadowheart is wrestling with what this pain means. Perhaps it is connected to Shar, she wonders, or perhaps not...*

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *Uncertainty. Shadowheart is wrestling with what this pain means. Perhaps it is connected to Shar, she wonders, or perhaps not...*

20.speaker: Player
20.text: 'Darkness protect me'? What did you mean by that?
20.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than 10

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: I... it's difficult for me to talk about. I'm sorry.
26.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than 10

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than zero, less than ten

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is less than zero

6.speaker: Player
6.text: You're a Shar worshipper, aren't you?
6.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

58.speaker: Shadowheart
58.text: ...I should have been more discreet around you, clearly. Yes, you're right.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Don't be sorry - just tell me what you're hiding.
19.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: You're not going to let this go, are you?
14.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: You're not going to let this go, are you?
48.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

46.speaker: Shadowheart
46.text: I worship Shar, the Mistress of the Night.
46.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.text: Don't make a fuss, Selûnite - we may be at odds, but I have more important concerns than you right now.
16.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.
61.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.
65.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: Fantastic. Monsters in our minds, and around our campfire.
39.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

80.speaker: Astarion
80.text: Heavens forbid. We're all entitled to our secrets.

85.speaker: Wyll
85.text: A Shar worshipper? Not my usual quarry - nor my usual ally.

30.speaker: Gale
30.text: You worship Shar? Blimey. She and my beloved Mystra are not exactly friends.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: I'll decide whether to make a fuss or not. Hard to trust someone who's holding out on me.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: I'll decide whether to make a fuss or not. Hard to trust someone who's holding out on me.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Don't make a big fuss...? You've been lying to me!

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: A lie of omission at most. I'm sure you have some skeletons of your own hidden away.

89.speaker: Shadowheart
89.text: Secrecy is everything for Shar's children. It's our code, our creed, our shield.

44.speaker: Shadowheart
44.text: I'm not sorry I kept this from you. Not one bit.

45.speaker: Shadowheart
45.text: Though perhaps that might change, if you can show an open mind.
45.context: NodeContext: Conceding jus a little towards the player's hurt feelings - but conditionally

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Let's see how open-minded I can be then: tell me more.
13.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: Talk to me later. The day's been long enough already.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I don't know how I feel about this.
59.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Who says you have to feel anything?

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: Gather your thoughts. Then, perhaps, we can talk some more.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: We can discuss this later. But let's just try a little more honesty going forward.
34.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

87.speaker: Shadowheart
87.text: All we can do is try, I suppose...

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Thank you for telling me, at least.
90.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Don't thank me - I'm breaking Lady Shar's teachings just by doing so... but sometimes you have to be practical.
2.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

8.speaker: Player
8.text: I can't trust you. Best if we travel separately for now.

77.speaker: Shadowheart
77.text: If you insist. Don't expect to fare well without me to save you.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: It's been some time since I met another faithful of Shar. Are you versed in her teachings?

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: Of course I am. But we can talk about this later - I want to enjoy the still of the night.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: You could have told me. How long were you going to keep this secret?

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: Forever, ideally. And you assume too much about what I can and cannot tell.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: I didn't agree to join up with a Shar worshipper.

62.speaker: Shadowheart
62.text: Then it's your own fault for not asking.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Now that the truth's out, tell me more.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: In future, I expect you to be honest. Let's leave it at that for now.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I don't care who you worship. We have bigger problems.

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: True. I didn't think you'd react so pragmatically. Perhaps I should have told you sooner.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Shar is an abomination. You deceived me.

53.speaker: Shadowheart
53.text: Your blindness as much as my deception, Selûnite. We can talk about this later - if you're willing.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I bow to Shar also. The Dark Lady must favour us, to have brought us together.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: I... yes, she must. I'll offer thanks to her in my prayers - and we should speak more later. Alone, ideally.

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: Now that you have the truth, please don't make a big fuss about it.

94.text: Please, it's nothing. Just let it rest.
94.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than zero

47.speaker: Shadowheart
47.text: Please, it's nothing. Just let it rest.
47.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than zero

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: It's nothing. Even if it was something, I'm clearly not going to tell you, am I? Let it go.
18.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is less than zero

88.speaker: Player
88.text: There's more to this. What aren't you telling me?

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Use your shared connection. Enter her thoughts.

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: *You sense her trying to understand what just happened. She silently begs her goddess for guidance - Shar.*

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *You sense her trying to understand what just happened. She silently begs her goddess for guidance - Shar.*

9.text: Stop! If I want to tell you something, I'll use my mouth - understand?

75.speaker: Shadowheart
75.text: Stop! If I want to tell you something, I'll use my mouth - understand?

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Fumble in my head again and I'll gut you.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Turn a blind eye and leave.
